name: Savager
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The savager makes one bite attack and one claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d12 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 38 (5d12 + 6) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Mighty Swing
special_abilities.desc: When a savager attacks without moving during its turn, it makes its claw attack with advantage.

special_abilities.name: Quills
special_abilities.desc: A creature takes 4 (1d8) piercing damage at the start of its turn while it is grappling a savager.
